About Me

The Rundown

Bio

I have a great passion for coding and web developement. I created the Central Florida Developers Network website in order to bring the developer community together

SKILLS SUMMARY: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Node.js, Responsive Design, Heroku, Github, User Authentication, React.js, MySQL and MongoDB.

Degrees & Certifications: B.A. Economics, UCF Full Stack Web Development Certification, Comptia Net+ and A+

Overseas Experience: Afghanistan, Liberia, India

Convergys

Manager Microsoft Account

I have been with Convergys for the last 5 years. I recently build the Microsoft account and continue to manage 50 employees on the account. I took a brief leave to work overseas.

Full Stack Developer

This is the umbrella that I pursue my web developement interests under.
